name: Semantic-sounds
body:
### What we did

Investigated the extent to which semantically similar words sound similar.


### Interesting word pairs

implication/ramification

artifact/artefact

decreased/increased

faultless/flawless

astonishingly/astoundingly

abysmal/dismal

elusive/illusive

### Heatmap of data

Based on 2 million word pairs.

Phonetic vs semantic similarity.

![alt text](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iwcs15-hack/semantic-sounds/master/data/sem-phon-gnews.png)

Simple heat map.

![alt text](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iwcs15-hack/semantic-sounds/master/data/phon-sem-smooth-gnews.png)

Filter out words with different spelling in British/US English (0.5 million word pairs).

![alt text](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iwcs15-hack/semantic-sounds/master/data/phon-sem-brit-US.png)

Word (i.e., character level) distance vs. semantics.

![alt text](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iwcs15-hack/semantic-sounds/master/data/word-sem-smooth-gnews.png)

Phonetic vs character level distance.

![alt text](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iwcs15-hack/semantic-sounds/master/data/phon-let-smooth-gnews.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
